title: 'Restrain yourself from atrocities': Mamata vs Delhi Police ahead of CEC meet over SIR
content: West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee arrived in Delhi for a meeting with the Election Commission amid political tension. She protested a heavy police presence outside Banga Bhavan, comparing the treatment to that of Union home minister Amit Shah's visits to West Bengal. Banerjee vowed to fight against alleged atrocities and harassment of people from Bengal.

title: Ajit Pawar‚Äôs son Parth breaks down while holding father‚Äôs chair at NCP office
content: Parth Pawar, son of the late Ajit Pawar, was deeply emotional at a prayer ceremony for his father's ashes, embracing an empty chair. NCP Maharashtra president Sunil Tatkare announced plans to take the ashes across the state for public homage. He also affirmed the NCP's commitment to the NDA, emphasizing their continued adherence to secular principles and social justice ideals.

title: Pune Porsche case: SC grants regular bail to 3 accused in juvenile blood swap
content: The Supreme Court has granted regular bail to three individuals accused in the Pune Porsche crash case. The incident, which occurred on May 19, 2024, involved a 17-year-old allegedly driving a Porsche Taycan and fatally striking two 24-year-old tech professionals.

title: Elon Musk shares Pie chart with ‚ÄòChinese warning‚Äô to America
content: Elon Musk has issued a stark warning about China's surging electricity generation, predicting it will soon triple US output, largely driven by solar power. He highlighted China's dominance in renewable energy and manufacturing, raising concerns for American competitiveness and energy security. Musk also identified China as Tesla's toughest competitor in the burgeoning humanoid robot market.

title: ‚ÄòWe completely agree with ICC‚Äô: BCCI VP on Pakistan boycotting India match at T20 WC
content: The BCCI fully supports the ICC's stance on sportsmanship after Pakistan's government announced their team would boycott the T20 World Cup match against India. BCCI vice-president Rajeev Shukla stated they will await formal discussions with the ICC before commenting further. The ICC emphasised that selective participation undermines the integrity of global sporting events.

title: 'Border 2' box office day 11: Sunny Deol film crosses Rs 275 crore
content: Released on January 23, 'Border 2' met fan expectations with a strong opening of ‚Çπ30 crore. The film saw significant growth over the Republic Day holiday, collecting ‚Çπ59 crore on its first Monday. After a robust first week totaling ‚Çπ224.25 crore, 'Border 2' continued its box office run, ultimately reaching ‚Çπ275.86 crore.

title: Techie in SUV blows kisses at woman sitting in car in Noida, trails her
content: Noida police apprehended two IT engineers for allegedly harassing a woman with obscene gestures from their car. The incident, which occurred late at night, saw the accused persistently follow the victim's vehicle and engage in indecent behavior.

title: Oracle may layoff up to 30,000; one of the reasons is firm's 'commitment'
content: Oracle faces potential job cuts of 20,000-30,000 to fund its massive $156 billion OpenAI partnership. The company has already incurred significant debt for data centers, and rising borrowing costs are stalling projects. OpenAI is reportedly shifting some capacity to Microsoft and Amazon, raising concerns about Oracle's delivery capabilities.

title: 'Nonsense ... disgraceful': Tharoor explodes as Pakistan boycotts India T20 World Cup clash
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor has criticized the politicization of cricket, calling Pakistan's boycott of its T20 World Cup match against India "disgraceful." He urged urgent dialogue to resolve the escalating row, emphasizing that sport should unite people. Tharoor also commented on the Mustafizur Rahman situation, deeming Bangladesh's reaction an overreaction.

title: 'I have been further linked' to Epstein: Ex-UK minister resigns from Labour Party
content: Former British ambassador Peter Mandelson has quit the Labour Party following renewed scrutiny over his links to Jeffrey Epstein. Newly released US documents allege Epstein made payments totaling $75,000 to Mandelson in the early 2000s. Mandelson, who has no recollection of these transfers, stated he doesn't want to cause further embarrassment to the party while he investigates the claims.

title: IMF data puts India above US in 2026 GDP growth, Elon Musk reacts
content: Elon Musk highlighted a significant global economic shift, noting India's projected contribution to worldwide growth surpassing the United States. This observation aligns with India's robust domestic strength, accelerated manufacturing, and resilient consumer demand, positioning it as a key driver of global expansion alongside China.

title: 'A total loser': Trump lashes out at Trevor Noah over Epstein Island joke at Grammys
content: President Donald Trump has threatened to sue comedian Trevor Noah for defamation after Noah joked during the Grammy Awards that Trump visited Epstein Island with Bill Clinton. Trump vehemently denied the accusation on Truth Social, calling Noah a "talentless dope" and vowing to send his lawyers after him.

title: 'Something happened behind the curtains': Sanjay Raut raises grave doubts on Ajit Pawar's death
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Sanjay Raut has raised suspicions regarding the death of NCP leader Ajit Pawar in a plane crash, calling it "dubious" and demanding a thorough investigation. Raut alleged that Pawar was seeking reconciliation with his uncle Sharad Pawar and faced pressure over the irrigation scam, drawing parallels to the Justice Loya case.

title: From Salman Khan threats to Rohit Shetty firing: Who is Bishnoi henchman Shubham Lonkar
content: Police are investigating if the firing outside filmmaker Rohit Shetty's residence is linked to his upcoming film projects or his recent acquisition of rights to a book on the underworld. Five individuals from Pune have been arrested in connection with the incident, with investigations ongoing into potential links to organized crime.

title: Boycott drama! 'Pakistan always make u-turns': Gavaskar takes dig amid India match row
content: Pakistan has confirmed participation in the T20 World Cup but will forfeit their match against India on February 15. Sunil Gavaskar believes this decision might not be final, citing Pakistan's history of players reversing retirement calls due to public pressure. India is expected to proceed with the fixture as scheduled.

title: Babar Azam overtakes Virat Kohli for major record, hands Pakistan timely T20 WC boost
content: Babar Azam shattered T20I records, surpassing Virat Kohli with his 39th half-century as Pakistan thrashed Australia 3-0.  A dominant batting display, including Saim Ayub's 56 and Shadab Khan's quickfire 46, set a formidable target.  Pakistan's bowlers, led by Mohammad Nawaz's 5-wicket haul, then dismantled Australia for 96, securing a resounding series win.

title: Good fasting sugar but high HbA1c: Doctor clears the confusion around diabetes tests
content: Diabetes diagnosis can be tricky. A fasting blood sugar test might seem normal, but your HbA1c could be high. This happens because HbA1c reflects average sugar over months, catching hidden spikes. Lifestyle changes like diet and exercise can help lower these levels. Understanding these tests is key for better health management.

title: Video: Actor Ram Charan, his daughter mobbed by fans outside Hyderabad hospital
content: Actor Ram Charan faced a mob of fans upon arriving at the hospital with his daughter to visit his wife and newborn twins. Videos show him navigating the crowd while holding his child. The incident sparked criticism online, with users calling for privacy for the family and condemning the public's behavior.

title: Budget 2026: What decides states‚Äô share of central taxes ‚Äî and how the formula has changed over time
content: Finance Commissions have reshaped central tax sharing by shifting focus from population and poverty to fiscal capacity, demographic performance, forest cover, and GDP contribution. While income distance remains key, its weight has decreased, with population criteria evolving and new measures like GDP contribution being introduced, reflecting a balance between equity and efficiency in resource allocation.

title: Union Budget 2026: Taxpayers, investors, consumers ‚Äî who gains, who hurts?
content: The Union Budget 2026 aims to balance growth, stability, and reform, offering compliance-friendly measures and targeted tax tweaks for taxpayers. While easing procedures and extending benefits for investors, it also tightens rules in select areas. Consumers receive relief on essential medical items, and businesses benefit from simplified customs, though some duty exemptions are phasing out.

title: IT professional shares why despite having a successful career she is forced to quit USA
content: Despite an Ivy League education, a six-figure tech job, and entrepreneurial success, Sunjana Ramana is leaving the US after three unsuccessful H-1B visa lottery attempts. Her story highlights how a random selection process, not merit, dictates the future of skilled foreign professionals in America, forcing many to seek opportunities elsewhere.

title: Watson baptized in Israel as Shedeur Sanders meets new Browns HC
content: Cleveland Browns veteran quarterback Deshaun Watson was baptized in Israel, an experience he described as life changing. Meanwhile, new head coach Todd Monken expressed his past desire to draft Shedeur Sanders, highlighting the quarterback‚Äôs significance to the team‚Äôs plans. Cybercitizens react to Watson‚Äôs baptism and Sanders‚Äô special meet with Monken, with one saying, they can‚Äôt wait to see the coach meet Myles Garrett.

title: Turning Point USA reveals platforms for rival Super Bowl halftime show
content: After months of silence, Turning Point USA has finally confirmed how fans can watch its alternative Super Bowl LX halftime show. The broadcast will stream on YouTube, X, Rumble, and several conservative TV networks. While distribution details are now clear, Turning Point USA has not revealed performers or production plans, which still leaves viewers with the question of what they will see when they tune in.

title: Lakers vs Knicks injury report & status: Playing, records and team stats
content: The Los Angeles Lakers face the New York Knicks on February 1, 2026, with both teams battling playoff implications and managing key injuries.  Player availability, particularly for guards like Austin Reaves and Jalen Brunson, will significantly impact rotations and the game's outcome.  The Lakers' scoring prowess will be tested against the Knicks' defensive focus.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 trades in green; BSE Sensex gains over 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmarks, opened flat in trade on Monday, a day after 2% crash on Budget‚Äôs hike in STT on futures and options. While Nifty50 went below 24,800, BSE Sensex was down over 100 points.

title: JKBOSE class 11th result released: Direct link to download here
content: The Jammu and Kashmir Board of School Education has announced the Class 11 Winter Zone Result 2025, recording an 83.27 per cent pass rate with over 67,900 students qualifying. Results are available on jkbose.jk.gov.in. JKBOSE has also opened revaluation applications for Classes 10 and 12, while advising students to treat online marksheets as provisional.

title: Pak says will play World Cup but boycott tie against India
content: Pakistan's cricket team will boycott its T20 World Cup league match against India on February 15, a move that has drawn sharp criticism from the ICC. The governing body warned of significant implications for Pakistan cricket and the global ecosystem.  Sources suggest Pakistan could face expulsion from tournaments and financial penalties.

title: Grammy Awards 2026 full and final winners' list
content: The 2026 Grammy Awards celebrated historic firsts and significant achievements. Kendrick Lamar became the most-awarded rapper ever, while Bad Bunny's Spanish-language album clinched Album of the Year. Billie Eilish took home Song of the Year, delivering a powerful message. Despite fan outcry, K-Pop artists once again left empty-handed.

title: Justice delayed is justice denied: When SC issued new directions on HC judgment delays
content: On 25.08.2025, a bench of Justice Sanjay Karol and Justice Prashant Kumar Mishra in Ravindra Pratap Shahi vs State of U.P. & Ors. The appeals came as a result of highly protracted proceedings before the Allahabad High Court, in which a criminal appeal pending decision in December 2021 was not decided in an unreasonably long time.

title: 'Mother' neither lenient nor strict: Piyush Goyal assures fruits for both India and EU
content: India's free trade agreement with the European Union, dubbed the "mother of all deals," is poised to significantly boost exports, granting duty-free access to 99% of Indian goods. Minister Piyush Goyal highlighted the pact's compassionate nature, benefiting both India and the EU. He urged domestic firms to seize this opportunity for expansion, while consumers anticipate more affordable goods.

title: Govinda, Chunky Panday, Shakti Kapoor, Manoj Tiwari booked in investment fraud case
content: Actors Govinda, Shakti Kapoor, Chunky Panday, and BJP MP Manoj Tiwari face probe in a Ghaziabad investment scam linked to Maxizone Touch Pvt Ltd. Investors alleged 15% monthly returns were promised but unpaid, with FIR filed after Jamshedpur complaint. Directors arrested in 2025; ED raided over fraud claims.

title: Delhi-NCR wakes up to dense fog, AQI moderate to poor
content: Dense fog enveloped Delhi on Monday morning, impacting visibility and leading to flight operations shifting to CAT III conditions. Air quality remained in the moderate to poor categories across the capital. Meanwhile, Mumbai reported a moderate AQI. This follows a 'very poor' air quality day in Delhi on Sunday, with weather alerts for thunderstorms and hail in the region.

title: Ghaziabad man watches 25 suicide videos, sets himself ablaze
content: A 25-year-old man died after setting himself ablaze in Modinagar, with police suspecting suicide after finding extensive online searches for painless death methods. However, his family alleges murder, claiming Madhur named an attacker before succumbing to his severe burns. Investigations are ongoing from all angles.

title: Mid-air mishap: Hot curry spills on Bengaluru passenger, costs IndiGo Rs 25,000
content: A passenger endured a shocking and painful experience when a flight attendant accidentally spilled hot curry on him shortly after takeoff from Bangkok to Bengaluru. The incident led to soiled clothes, discomfort, and embarrassment. The consumer commission found the airline vicariously liable for the lapse in service and ordered compensation.

title: No more KYV for FASTag: What this rule change means for car owners
content: The National Highways Authority of India is simplifying FASTag for cars. From February 1, 2026, new FASTags for cars, jeeps, and vans will not require mandatory Know Your Vehicle checks. This change aims to speed up toll payments. Existing FASTags will also see routine checks removed. Verification will only happen in specific cases. This makes the system easier for drivers.

title: ‚ÄòWe know about your mom‚Äô: Mamdani faces heat over Epstein row; supporters heckle NYC mayor at home
content: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani faced voter protests at his home following the release of new Jeffrey Epstein-related documents. These records mention his mother, filmmaker Mira Nair, in connection with a 2009 social event hosted by Ghislaine Maxwell. Protesters expressed anger and disappointment, questioning Mamdani's integrity after having supported him.

title: Ciggies costlier by up to Rs 55/pack after excise hike
content: Cigarette prices have surged by Rs 22-25 per pack of 10 following a new excise duty regime, the first tax hike in seven years. This move aligns India's tobacco taxation with global health standards. Premium cigarettes will see significant price increases, with distributors anticipating new MRPs from Monday. Concerns about smuggling and counterfeit products are rising.

title: What were you doing at 22? Carlos Alcaraz conquers Melbourne
content: Carlos Alcaraz achieved a historic career Grand Slam at 22, defeating Novak Djokovic in a thrilling Australian Open final. Despite a turbulent pre-season, Alcaraz showcased remarkable composure and strategic brilliance, adapting his game to overcome the seasoned champion. His improved serve, influenced by Djokovic himself, proved pivotal in securing the Norman Brookes Challenge Cup.

title: Rupee back in green! Currency rises 18 paise to 91.75 against US dollar
content: The rupee strengthened against the US dollar, recovering from an all-time low as forex reserves hit a record high. Despite a cautious market sentiment post-Union Budget, domestic equities saw gains. Global oil prices eased as US-Iran talks progressed. Foreign investors remained net sellers in the equity market.

title: Helen of Troy: Why she was likely brown, not black or white
content: Helen of Troy, often celebrated as the catalyst for the epic Trojan War, is believed to have embodied the classic Mediterranean aesthetic.

title: Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda tying the knot on this date
content: Speculation is rife as February begins, with reports suggesting Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda are set to marry in Udaipur. While initial whispers pointed to February 26, newer claims indicate a shift to February 5, with pre-wedding festivities commencing around February 2.

title: Uttarakhand: Avalanche warning in 5 hill districts after fresh snowfall
content: Avalanche advisories are in effect for five Uttarakhand districts following fresh snowfall in higher regions. Uttarkashi, Chamoli, and Rudraprayag face Danger Level-2, while Pithoragarh and Bageshwar are at Level-1. Residents in snow-bound areas are urged to exercise caution and stay informed about weather updates.

title: LeBron named All-Star reserve, extending record
content: LeBron James is an NBA All-Star for a record-extending 22nd consecutive year after the league announced its reserves for the Feb. 15 midseason showcase Sunday night.

title: Lightning say goalie fight key in historic comebac...
content: The Lightning credited the first goalie fight in an NHL outdoor game -- between Andrei Vasilevskiy and Jeremy Swayman -- for helping to spark their historic Stadium Series comeback win over the Bruins on Sunday.

title: Sources: Reds land slugger Suarez with $15M deal
content: Slugger Eugenio Su√°rez and the Reds have agreed to a one-year, $15 million contract that includes a mutual option for the 2027 season, sources told ESPN.

title: Pastrnak vents about nullified OT goal: 'A joke'
content: David Pastrnak said it was "a joke" that his apparent winning overtime goal was nullified by a penalty in the Bruins' eventual 6-5 shootout loss to the Lightning on Sunday.

title: Sources: Kubiak to try to reach deal with Raiders
content: The Raiders are expected to hire Seahawks offensive coordinator Klint Kubiak as their next head coach after the Super Bowl, sources told ESPN's Adam Schefter.

title: Sources: WNBA, union meeting could be 'pivotal'
content: The WNBA and WNBPA will meet Monday morning in New York, sources close to the process told ESPN, a meeting many believe could be "pivotal" in whether a new collective bargaining agreement is reached or players decide to strike.

title: Rose sets scoring mark in dominant win at Torrey
content: Justin Rose became the first wire-to-wire winner at Torrey Pines in 71 years, starting with a six-shot lead and closing with a 2-under 70 to win the Farmers Insurance Open.

title: Spurs earn Johnson All-Star Game coaching nod
content: After a whirlwind travel day that began at 6 a.m. in Charlotte and included a flight diversion to Atlanta, the Spurs beat the Magic 112-103 on Sunday night to clinch an All-Star Game coaching nod for Mitch Johnson in his first full season at the helm.

content: After a week of betting, sportsbooks are split on how to handle the heavy volume on Seattle to cover the spread.

title: Carrick's calm exactly what Man United need
content: Michael Carrick has three wins from three games, thanks in part to an ability to keep things simple amid chaos.

title: Nelly Korda wins LPGA opener as final round cancel...
content: Nelly Korda won the season-opening Tournament of Champions without hitting a shot Sunday as the LPGA Tour canceled the final round due to wind and cold.

title: Inside the 'most dangerous gym in America,' where Eagles' WR A.J. Brown trained
content: Diamond Gym doesn't just build muscle -- it tests the resolve of everyone who walks through the door.

title: Why Shakur Stevenson's next possible challenger is...
content: Shakur Stevenson dominated Teofimo Lopez Jr. and looked unbeatable. But he's still looking for bigger challenges.

content: The defending national champions are building a case to move up the bracket -- and as a threat to repeat.

content: In danger of falling out of the field, USC got its most important win of the season Thursday. Mississippi State also got a big one.

content: The winter transfer window will close at 7 p.m. GMT / 2 p.m. ET, and teams are still looking to do some deals before the deadline. Catch up on everything from around Europe.

title: What to do with Giannis? The best- and worst-case ...
content: With Giannis Antetokounmpo rumored to be in his final days with Milwaukee, Andre Snellings takes a look at the possible destinations and which would be best and worst for his fantasy value.

title: Student dies on BITS Pilani Goa campus; 6th incident in 2 years
content: Vishnavi Jitesh (20), a third-year engineering student, was found dead in her hostel room late on February 1 night

title: The Hindu Editorial | Credible and creditable: On Union Budget 2026-27
content: Budget 2026 avoids major direct tax cuts, raising concerns for individuals and corporations seeking relief. Fiscal prudence and subdued revenue projections signal a cautious approach amid global economic uncertainties.

title: One crore jobs and employment opportunities to be created by 2030: Bihar Governor tells State legislature
content: The Governor also said that maintaining the rule of law and communal harmony were the top priorities of the government, which strove towards achieving ‚Äúdevelopment with justice‚Äù

title: Anvar is UDF candidate in Beypore, confirms KPCC
content: P.V. Anvar, who emerged victorious from Nilambur, a United Democratic Front (UDF) stronghold, in 2016 and 2021 as a Left Democratic Front-backed Independent candidate, later severed his ties with the front, protesting against the policies of Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan

content: The top court, however, asked the Centre and the office of the Registrar General and Census Commissioner, India to consider the suggestions made by PIL petitioner Aakash Goel

title: Supreme Court grants bail to three accused in 2024 Pune luxury car crash case
content: A bench of Justices B.V. Nagarathna and Ujjal Bhuyan observed that parents are not able to control their children

title: New school fee law will not be implemented in the current academic year: Delhi govt tells Supeme Court
content: The new State law mandates that any increase in fees charged by private schools must be cleared through a two-tier regulatory framework comprising school-level committees and district-level appellate authorities

title: Bipartisan interest in making sure India-U.S. relationship is strong, ties vital for global peace: top American leaders
content: The Consulate General of India in New York hosted a special reception in New York on January 31 to commemorate the 77th Republic Day of India

content: He said that the Siddaramaiah-led Congress government in the State forms an SIT whenever it wants to safeguard its supporters, and target opposition party leaders

content: The searches were being carried out in Rafiabad, Sopore, Bomai (in Baramulla district), Bandipora and Parimpora area of the city, the officials said

title: Supreme Court directs Centre to constitute tribunal to settle Pennaiyar river dispute between T.N. and Karnataka
content: A Bench, headed by Justice Vikram Nath, directed the Central government to issue a notification to constitute the inter-State water disputes tribunal within a month

title: Jaishankar embarks on 3-day visit to U.S. to attend critical minerals ministerial
content: The ministerial, held by the U.S. will focus on supply chain resilience, clean energy transitions, and strategic cooperation in critical minerals

title: Jyoti ratha yatra for Raichur District Utsav 2026 flagged off
content: Raichur District Utsav 2026 will be organized from February 5 to 7 on the campus of University of Agricultural Science (UAS) Raichur

content: The editorial further said Sunetra Pawar‚Äôs deputy CM post should not be a mere ornamental. She may probably not be ‚Äúgungi gudiya‚Äù (mute doll) and work effectively, it opined

content: MGNREGA was a demand-based legal guarantee and not just an administrative promise, Jairam Ramesh said

content: P. Chidambaram noted that only the Ministry of External Affairs and the Prime Minister would be aware of any underlying complications in the purchase of oil from Venezuela

title: Vijayapura police detect land grabbing of 158 acres, arrest 200 accused
content: As much as 158 acres returned to real owners who are either senior citizens, or those who did not live near their land, or those who had ancestral land in Vijayapura, but had migrated to other cities in Karnataka or other States

title: Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan demands judicial enquiry into realtor C.J. Roy‚Äôs suspected suicide during IT raid
content: Mr Vijayan said the suspected death by suicide of the entrepreneur had shocked civic society and the business community. He termed the incident a ‚Äúblot‚Äù on the country‚Äôs tax administration

content: The earlier rules did not affect Apple‚Äôs South Korean rival Samsung as almost all of ‚Å†its phones are made in its own Indian factories, and not by contract manufacturers

title: Stock markets bounce back in early trade after sharp decline on Budget day
content: The 30-share BSE Sensex climbed 302 points to 81,024.94 during initial trade. The 50-share NSE Nifty went up by 59.25 points to 24,884.70

title: Will protect law and order at any cost: CM Naidu
content: As the YSRCP‚Äôs misdeeds were exposed one by one, its leaders were resorting to filthy comments and inciting violence, Mr. Naidu said.

title: IIT-Gn team builds precise sieve for industry with molecular ‚Äòdonuts‚Äô
content: The find is significant because accurate separation is essential to purify water, capture carbon, and to manufacture certain medicines

title: Union Budget ignores public education, betrays workers: V. Sivankutty
content: Terming the Budget as ‚Äúanti-worker and pro-corporate‚Äù, he alleged that the Centre has completely sidelined the working class

title: Government proposes to exempt award given by Motor Accident Claims Tribunal from income tax
content: According to the Budget document, the provisions of the Motor Vehicles Act, 1988, inter alia, provide for compensation and an interest on the compensation to be awarded by the tribunal to an individual or his/her legal heir, on account of death or permanent disability or any bodily injury under the said Act

title: Rajnath praises Coast Guard‚Äôs role during Operation Sindoor, urges it to prepare 2047 roadmap
content: Addressing an event to mark the Indian Coast Guard‚Äôs 50th Raising Day, Rajnath Singh said Operation Sindoor displayed ‚Äúseamless inter-service coordination‚Äù within India‚Äôs multi-layered maritime security system, and reaffirmed the role of the ICG as a ‚Äúfrontline force‚Äù

title: Government raises limit for bringing duty-free imported goods to ‚Çπ75,000 under new baggage rules
content: Under the Baggage Rules, 2026, a resident or a tourist of Indian origin arriving in India other than by land, shall be allowed clearance free of duty articles, up to ‚Çπ75,000, if such articles are carried on the person or in the bona fide accompanied baggage of the passenger

title: ‚ÄòSomething out of ordinary‚Äô: Nirmala Sitharaman interacts with college students who witnessed Parliament's Budget session live
content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman spoke about the efforts that are being made to ensure a ‚Äúbetter India‚Äù for students while drawing a contrast with the India she grew up in

title: Assam government accused of letting corporate houses take over tribal lands
content: Political parties and social organisations in Dima Hasao district cite the allotment of more than 9,000 bighas of land for limestone mining to feed cement plants and a proposed mega hydropower project

title: Union Budget 2026 falls short of expectations in poll-bound West Bengal
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee said that the Budget had nothing to offer to people of the State. The Bharatiya Janata Party  (BJP) leadership said that the infrastructure push through rail and freight corridors will push economy of the State.

title: Himachal CM Sukhu terms Union Budget ‚Äòinequitable‚Äô, raises concerns over Finance Commission report
content: Himachal Pradesh CM Sukhvinder Singh Sukhu said the Budget overlooked the concerns and priorities of Himachal Pradesh, even as he raised serious concerns regarding the recently tabled 16th¬†Finance Commission

title: Union Budget an inspiring blueprint for building ‚ÄòViksit Bharat‚Äô, says U.P. CM
content: Budget will provide opportunities to the youth, security to farmers, encouragement to entrepreneurs, relief to the middle class, respect to workers, and new impetus for innovation, says Adityanath

title: Activists express concerns over Odisha government turning a blind eye to depletion of mineral resources
content: The government is facilitating mineral extraction by large corporate houses without taking a long-term view of resource sustainability, says Lingaraj, a prominent rights activist

content: Scores of girls also attended the PDP initiative and highlighted the issues the new generation was facing when it comes to employment and political aspirations. The meeting was held in the old city‚Äôs Babademb¬†area.

title: Mamata Banerjee to meet CEC Gyanesh Kumar
content: The Chief Minister has written six letters to the Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar on the issue of SIR over the past few months. In the last letter dated January 31, Ms. Banerjee said that SIR has resulted in as many as 140 deaths and was being carried out in blatant disregard of human rights and humanitarian considerations

title: National Fibre scheme to integrate various schemes for natural and man-made fibres under Textiles Ministry
content: ‚ÄòWe are aiming to double the country‚Äôs textile value chain from the existing $170 billion to $350 billion by 2030,‚Äô P. Sivakumar says

content: Members of Legislative Assembly (MLA) from both Kuki-Zo and Meitei communities were headed to New Delhi to attend the meeting

title: State Highways Dept. commences work on bridge across Palar river
content: The ‚Çπ17.65-crore high-level bridge across Viruthasiri river is expected to benefit residents of at least 28 surrounding villages

title: Watch: No specific giveaways for poll-bound states in Budget 2026 ‚Äî The Hindu Reporters Explain
content: The Hindu‚Äôs reporters across these States to understand the allocations and the political reactions on the ground.

title: Budget 2026 moots several proposals to rejuvenate indigenous shipping
content: In today‚Äôs speech, the Finance Minister spoke about the government‚Äôs aim to develop inland and coastal shipping so that its share in total cargo carried through road, rail and water increases from 6% to 12%

title: Union Budget 2026: Marginal hike in allocations for Social Justice Dept., Tribal Affairs Ministry
content: The Social Justice Department‚Äôs allocation for 2026-27 is ‚Çπ13,687.59 crore and the Tribal Affairs Ministry has been allocated ‚Çπ15,421.97 crore; the allocations have increased by 16.69% and 42.47% respectively compared with their respective Revised Estimates for the current fiscal

title: Kerala for All conclave: State told to cater to neuro-inclusive travel
content: On its part, Kerala must introduce an inclusive-destination certification scheme like in the West, which ought to be highlighted in the respective websites

title: Two men who opposed harassment of Muslim shopkeeper booked in Uttarakhand
content: FIR lodged against members of right-wing groups who blocked a national highway to express anger over the intervention of Deepak Kumar and Vijay Rawat

title: Watch: Union Budget proposals spark political debate ahead of West Bengal polls
content: Infrastructure proposals in the Union Budget, including freight and industrial corridors and tourism projects, have triggered a political clash in West Bengal ahead of Assembly elections, with the BJP pitching development and the TMC calling the announcements political signalling.

title: Praful Patel denies Piyush Goyal‚Äôs claim that he has been appointed NCP chief
content: ‚ÄúCompletely baseless,‚Äù says Mr. Patel; Mr. Goyal later apologises; CM Devendra Fadnavis refutes Sharad Pawar‚Äôs claims of an NCP merger; DCM Sunetra Pawar reaches Baramati for Ajit Pawar‚Äôs last rites

title: Union Budget 2026: Agri Ministry allocation up 2.6%; farm outfits say FM ignored their demands
content: No hike for Kisan Samman Nidhi; agri research and education budget drops 4.8%; Food and PDS gets 10% hike; new multilingual AI tool, high-value cash crops get extra support; government did not fulfil promises to farmers, says BKS

title: Address ‚Äòlongstanding demands‚Äô of Baloch people, India tells Pakistan
content: The remarks from the official spokesperson of the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) came after Pakistan‚Äôs Interior Minister Mohsin Raza Naqvi alleged that the latest attacks were carried out with help from India

title: Trade bodies say Budget powers MSMEs, provides boost to domestic manufacturing and further simplifies doing business
content: A growth-oriented and sector-enabling Budget for micro and small scale industries that balances capital infusion, infrastructure expansion and proposes¬†cluster modernisation, and policy reform to support global competitiveness and sustainable employment generation in the MSE sector

title: CM remembers Sri Siddaramanand Puri Swami for his spirituality, secularism
content: He was addressing a gathering at a tribute function got up for the late swamiji at Tinthini Bridge in Deodurg taluk of Raichur district

title: Files expose alleged links between Epstein, Anil Ambani and Delhi ‚Äòleadership‚Äô
content: Anil Ambani appears to have met with Epstein on May 23, 2019, following which Epstein messaged Steve Bannon that he had met Prime Minister Modi‚Äôs ‚Äúguy‚Äù

title: A budget for difficult times
content: Union Budget sets Centre‚Äôs capital expenditure target at ‚Çπ12.2 lakh crore; India must stay deeply integrated with global markets, attracting stable long-term investment, says Finance Minister

title: Union Budget 2026 does little to reduce out-of-pocket expenses, medical inflation: experts
content: While exempting 17 cancer medicines from basic customs duty was welcome, there is little evidence to suggest that companies passed on the benefit to the customers in earlier instances

title: Karnataka is set to lose about ‚Çπ10,000 crore to ‚Çπ15,000 crore due to 16th FC‚Äôs recommendation, says Siddaramaiah
content: ‚ÄúWhen Karnataka‚Äôs share in the divisible pool of central taxes fell from 4.71% under the 14th Finance Commission to 3.64% under the 15th Finance Commission, the estimated loss was over 23% in revenue,‚Äù he pointed out.

title: Budget draws mixed reactions from common people
content: While some say Budget aligns with long-term vision of Viksit Bharat 2047, some express concerns about implementation of proposed initiatives and highlight unaddressed gaps in scholarships, education loans, teacher upskilling and campus-level mental health support

title: BRS cadre stage protests across Telangana against SIT examination of KCR
content: Police prevent different forms of protests at various places; Party ranks scuffle with police at Telangana Bhavan

content: Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman also said that a National Destination Digital Knowledge Grid to digitally document all places of cultural, spiritual and historic significance would be set up

title: Tadoba‚Äôs tiger swims two rivers, kills three cattle in A.P.
content: The Male tiger had moved via the Polavaram Irrigation project before swimming the river Godavari to enter into human habitations in search of prey.

title: Industry forums in Kerala welcome development proposals in Union Budget
content: The FICCI and the Indian Chamber of Commerce & Industry, Cochin, praised initiatives aimed at bolstering manufacturing, with significant funding for bio-pharma and electronic components.

title: Rahul Gandhi vs Rajnath Singh Over Ex-Army Chief's Book On Ladakh Stand-Off
content: Leader of Opposition (LoP) in Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, began his speech in Parliament today by holding out a magazine article on an unpublished book by former Army chief, General MM Naravane on the Ladakh stand-off between India and China in 2020.

title: Parliament Budget Session 2026¬†Live: Rahul Gandhi Raises Ladakh Stand-Off In Lok Sabha, Rajnath Singh Intervenes
content: Budget Session of Parliament¬†2026 Live Updates: Leader of Opposition Rahul Gandhi today spoke during discussion on Motion of Thanks on the President's Address , a day after finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented her ninth Union Budget

title: Why Trump's Pick For Fed Chair Hit Gold, Silver Markets For Good Reasons
content: After months of record highs and stretched valuations, spot prices for gold and silver dropped 9% and 28% respectively after US President Donald Trump confirmed he will be nominating Kevin Warsh as the next chair of the US Federal Reserve

title: 200 CCTVs, 10 Days Of Surveillance: How Bhopal Railway Cops Caught Thief
content: In a case that reads like a crime thriller, Government Railway Police, Bhopal has arrested a highly educated, foreign-returned thief who preyed on unsuspecting passengers sleeping in AC coaches, turning late-night train journeys into hunting grounds.

title: 14 Indian Migrant Workers Stranded In Dubai Appeal For Safe Return
content: Nearly 14 migrant workers from different districts of Jharkhand facing difficulties allegedly due to unpaid wages in Dubai have appealed to the state government for facilitating their safe return, an official said on Monday.

title: Mamata Banerjee's 'Torture Of Bengalis In Delhi' Claim Before Poll Chief Meet
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Monday alleged the "torture" and "atrocities" of Bengalis in the national capital, hours before she was scheduled to lead a Trinamool Congress delegation to meet Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar.

title: "Get Facts Straight": Trump Warns "Loser" Trevor Noah Of Lawsuit After Epstein Jibe
content: Trevor Noah, the host of the 68th Grammy Awards, took a jibe at Donald Trump over his mention in the Epstein files with a Greenland reference. The US President is now ready to have "some fun" with him and send lawyers his way, he warned.

title: "Something Fishy About The Crash": Shiv Sena, Congress On Ajit Pawar's Death
content: The death of Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister and Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) president Ajit Pawar in a plane crash near Maharashtra's Baramati has triggered a political storm that shows little sign of abating.

title: "Pakistan Can't Face Us": Baloch Woman 'Fidayeen' Shoots Rifle, Smiles, Then Dies
content: Baloch rebel group Balochistan Liberation Army has released a video of a female 'fidayeen' (suicide attacker) involved in a large-scale assault across Pakistan's Balochistan province over the weekend, one of the deadliest operations in recent years.

title: Manuel Rabate Appointed As CEO And Director Of Kiran Nadar Museum Of Art
content: Manuel Rabate has been appointed Chief Executive Officer and Director of the Kiran Nadar Museum of Art (KNMA) in New Delhi. He currently serves as Director of Louvre Abu Dhabi.

title: Opinion: Opinion | India's Tax Burden Is Falling On The Wrong Shoulders: The Middle Class
content: The middle class has been doing the heavy lifting for far too long. It's time for policy to recognise and reward that contribution.

title: Opinion: Opinion | Budget 2026: Is 'Invisible Kerala' Paying The Price For Being 'Unaligned'?
content: What Kerala needs is not just sympathy or slogans. We need an alternative that commands respect in Delhi and delivers development in Kerala. Right now, we have neither.

title: Video: Retired Army Officer On Bonnet, Man Drives For A Km After Road Rage
content: A retired army soldier was dragged for nearly 1 km while clinging desperately to the bonnet of a speeding car before being violently thrown onto the road and left injured in Madhya Pradesh's Gwalior on Saturday.

title: On Camera, A Bike Chase And Rs 31 Lakh Robbery In Karnataka
content: A robbery carried out in broad daylight has been caught on CCTV, showing a young cash pickup agent being intercepted and robbed of over Rs 31 lakh and his two-wheeler.

title: Pic In Underwear, Rs 68 Lakh Payment: Ex British Envoy's Epstein Links
content: A former British ambassador to the US allegedly received $75,000 (Rs 68.7 lakh approximately) from late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, new documents released by the US Justice Department suggest.

title: Class 9 Boy, Missing For Days, Found Dead Inside Drain In Karnataka
content: A class nine student went missing in Bengaluru, and three days later, came the most horrific news for the family - he is dead.

title: Karnataka Woman Hangs Her 3 Children, Drinks Diesel In Suicide Attempt
content: A 27-year-old woman in Karnataka's Bagalkote district allegedly killed her three young children by hanging them before attempting suicide.

title: BJP "Mastermind" Behind Sunetra Pawar's Appointment: Shiv Sena Editorial
content: The Opposition Shiv Sena (UBT) on Monday claimed the BJP leadership was the "mastermind" behind NCP leader Sunetra Pawar taking oath as Maharashtra's deputy chief minister, just days after her husband Ajit Pawar's demise.

title: Momo For Rs 85 Lakh? UP Boy Gives Away Family Jewellery To Street Vendor
content: A Class 7 boy's love for momo took an unexpected and shocking turn in Uttar Pradesh, where a simple craving for his favourite snack ended with his family losing jewellery worth nearly Rs 85 lakh.

title: Peaceful Protests Across US Over Persecution of Minorities In Bangladesh
content: Demonstrators gathered in city centers across the United States on Saturday in coordinated, peaceful rallies to raise awareness about alleged violence against Hindu and other minority communities in Bangladesh.

title: Shaun White's next act? Revolutionizing snowboardi...
